stepTitle: A family bakery makes cupcakes and sells them at local outdoor festivals. For a music festival, there is a fixed cost of $125 to set up a cupcake stand. The owner estimates that it costs $$\$0.75$$ to make each cupcake. The owner is interested in determining the total cost (C) as a function of number of cupcakes made (x). Find the slope of the function that models this scenario. Enter answer as a decimal.
